description: News about the British phone hacking scandal (Leveson Report), including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: British Phone Hacking Scandal (Leveson Report)
title_page: British Phone Hacking Scandal (Leveson  Report) - The New York Times
maintext:
Piers Morgan signs a new deal with his first boss, Rupert Murdoch.
The television host's last job came to an end when he stormed off the set. Under the new deal, he will host a show and write a column.
